connector.description:
A Kamelet that can read events from an IBM MQ message queue using JMS.

In your KameletBinding file, you must explicitly declare the IBM MQ Server driver dependency in spec->integration->dependencies

- "mvn:com.ibm.mq:com.ibm.mq.allclient:<version>"

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.serverNa.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.serverName
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.serverNa.description: IBM MQ Server name or address

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.destinat.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.destinationType
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.destinat.description: The JMS destination type (queue or topic)

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.queueMan.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.queueManager
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.queueMan.description: Name of the IBM MQ Queue Manager

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.channel.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.channel
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.channel.description: Name of the IBM MQ Channel

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.clientId.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.clientId
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.clientId.description: Name of the IBM MQ Client ID

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.username
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.username.description: Username to authenticate to IBM MQ server

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.password
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-source.password.description: Password to authenticate to IBM MQ server
